hero.title: How the funding works
hero.description: Outfund offers on-demand, non-dilutive funding. We combine the best of debt and equity finance, and avoid the worst of each.

humanCapital.title: Human capital
humanCapital.description:
We provide support beyond funding. Our portfolio team are here to regularly check in, advise on your growth, and make introductions to our extensive network of trusted partners. We give every founder access to services which are usually hidden behind the walls of venture capital.

Your Growth Manager is an advisor, sparring partner, troubleshooter, and follow-on funding manager, all rolled into one. At Outfund, we prioritise long-term relationships over short-term gains

process.title: The Process
process.description: Start growing now - No paperwork, just funding at your fingertips

steps.title: 1. Apply for funding
steps.description: Securely connect your accounts: we sync with your existing banking and payments systems to analyse your revenue data in realtime. Receive a tailored offer from £10K to £2M within 48 hours.

steps.title: 2. Select an offer
steps.description: Start spending your funds: 100% of the capital is available to use after selecting our offer. Ramp your investment in marketing and inventory to fuel your growth.

steps.title: 3. Repay on your terms
steps.description: Pay back your balance with a small share of your new sales. Payments flex up and down in line with your incoming revenue. Quiet month? Lower repayments.

steps.title: 4. Scale faster
steps.description: Meet our network: we connect you with growth partners, specialist agencies and VCs so you can hit your long-term milestones.

steps.title: 5. Top up
steps.description: Access follow-on capital: your dedicated Growth Manager supports your ongoing capital needs so you can keep scaling without limits.

questions.question: How much funding do you offer?
questions.answer: We can deploy between £10,000 and £2,000,000 at a time.

questions.question: How do you calculate my offer?
questions.answer:
Outfund securely connects to your existing banking, payment processing, and accounting platforms. Using predictive models, we assess key metrics from your revenue, ad performance and other third party data to create bespoke funding offers.

Our funding is based on your performance. We don't take any equity, meaning we don't dilute you or your investors. Instead, funding is repaid through a simple revenue share.

questions.question: How long does the whole process take?
questions.answer: The entire process (application, offer, approval, sending funds) can be completed in as little as two business days. Large advances and applications requiring special considerations or analysis may take slightly longer.

questions.question: How do I apply?
questions.answer:
You can apply in minutes here. You'll need to be a director of the company you're applying for.

You'll need to connect your business bank account, payment processor and company financial accounts. This data will allow us to build your funding offer.
